Question: On 9 July 2008, this person entered the Australian Big Brother house for a three-day visit.
Hints: This person has since appeared in Playboy several times in the 1990s and 2000s.
After graduating from École Highland Secondary School in 1985, this person moved to Vancouver and worked as a fitness instructor.
In February 2006, this person decided to boycott the Kentucky Derby because of its support for Kentucky Fried Chicken.
